definition: at a distance of/distance/to be apart

sentences.english: Arbitrary pitch selection is of high importance.
sentences.chinese: 任意螺距選擇是非常重要的。

sentences.english: Do you have a controllable pitch propeller?
sentences.chinese: 你船是可變螺距推進器嗎？

sentences.english: Check of propeller pitch is needed.
sentences.chinese: 螺旋槳的螺距需要矯正。

sentences.english: She has a single right-handed fixed pitch propeller.
sentences.chinese: 本船是單螺旋槳，右旋，固定螺距。

sentences.english: The positioning bidirectional pitch compensation method is applied in NC system.
sentences.chinese: 定點式雙向螺距補償法應用在數控系統中。
我們船有可變螺距螺旋槳。

sentences.english: Thus, Calculating the critical rotational speed of the helix ditching machine.
sentences.chinese: 由此，推導出立軸柱形變螺距螺旋開溝機的臨界轉速。

sentences.english: Once the screw turns a circle, the liquid inside the sealing chamber will be pushed forward by a pitch.
sentences.chinese: 螺桿每轉一週，密封腔中的液體向前推進一個螺距。

sentences.english: We have a fixed pitch propeller .

sentences.chinese: 我們船有固定螺距螺旋槳。

sentences.english: We have an adjustable pitch propeller.
Smart Start Keep a screw pitch gauge in your tool box.
sentences.chinese: 聰明的開頭在你的工具箱裏放一個螺距規。

sentences.english: The main blades pitch angle is controlled by the up and down movements of the swashplate.
sentences.chinese: 大槳的螺距角度是由傾斜盤的上升和下降動作控制的。
